title: Guided Meditation #3
description:
Welcome to episode 162 of Sleep and Relax ASMR! This episode we use positive affirmations and trigger words to help you totally relax. Enjoy!

Remember to visit DSTLD.com and use promo code ASMR for 10% off: www.DSTLD.com

Website: www.SleepandRelaxASMR.com

DOWNLOAD:

iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/sleep-and-relax-asmr/id1133320064?mt=2
